Vice President, Worldwide Corporate Sales
AppDynamics
positions.description:
AppDynamics is the leading provider of application performance management for modern application architectures in both the cloud and the data center, delivering solutions for highly distributed, dynamic, and agile environments. Companies such as Netflix, Priceline, TiVo, and ZipRealty use AppDynamics to monitor, troubleshoot, diagnose, and scale production applications, and over 80,000 people have downloaded AppDynamics Lite, its free java troubleshooting solution. The company was recognized as a Gartner Cool Vendor in IT Operations Management and recently as a Visionary and Leader in the Gartner APM Magic Quadrant.

I currently manage the corporate sales team responsible for driving revenue across US, EMEA, and APAC.

A couple core directives are;

- increasing ASP
- increasing New Logo acquisition
- ensuring both upsell and cross-sell of our holistic APM offering
- decreasing Inside reps ramp time to productivity
- ensuring we continually improve on customer support and excellence
- meeting WW personnel hiring plan - grew the team over 400%
- meeting renewal objectives

I was hired by Sean to lead the EMEA Inside sales team in 2015. Sean is always a source of positive energy and an inspiring leader. What makes Sean different from other leaders is that he is intrinsically helpful and genuinely concerned for his team's welfare. Sean always seemed to have a solution, and always know what to say to inspire and reassure all his direct reports and wider team around him which got people to work together efficiently and effectively as a team. With his extreme focus in PG & MEDDIC he also established strategies, processes, and routines so that high performance was tangible. Sean is ranked as one of the best leaders and i hope i gain the opportunity to work with him again.

Even though Sean had a very busy schedule he always took the time to jump on a call if I had any issues or needed his help and support. Sean always find the right words to motivate you and always goes the extra miles to make sure you are motivated and happy. His work ethic is such an example for me. I hope to work with Sean in the future as it was an honour.

He has an extreme focus on PG and following MEDDICC process. His passion and focus on how he ran his business reflected in how I ran my deals and I was much more professional and successful because of it. I was Sean's first hire at AppDynamics in 2012, so I had the privilege of working for him through the early stages of AppDynamics inside sales and its many iterations. Building and scaling a team to survive in a hyper-growth company like AppDynamics takes a real skill-set. To move from survival to success quarter over quarter, YoY, takes an elite skill-set. Sean built a successful team by driving a culture centered on collaboration and enablement. After that foundation, he engrained a world-class sales process (MEDDICC) into the operating rhythm of our team. From there, he elevated the team's productivity by driving "maniacal PG" across all inside sales functions. Through the many iterations of our sales GoToMarket, Sean helped keep the team focused on the bigger picture (building the next great software company, and helping reps like myself seize the opportunity at hand and grow into the next role). All in all, Sean is an amazing leader and great friend.

received.text:
I hired Greg onto my team early on in my management career as I was setting out to build an all star sales team.  Greg is just that, an all star, Greg is a truly exceptional account manager, with high energy; tons of charisma and proven ability to find and build true champions. Furthermore Greg truly exemplifies what it means to be a team player, constantly helping those around him and some one I could always rely on in a pinch when we needed to rally at the end of a quarter. 

I could not have been happier, when after a few years of crushing his goals. Greg was promoted to a field account manager. Just as he has excelled as an Sr sales specialist Greg went on to excel in the field role. 

Its been a pleasure watching Greg’s career to date, he is a rare find and some one that will always do the right thing along with what is needed to get the job done.

I hired Tim 3 years ago as I started to build out the NA commercial account team at AppD.  Tim is a truly exceptional account manager, with high energy; tons of charisma and proven ability to find and build true champions. Tim truly exemplifies what it means to be a team player, constantly helping those around him and some one I could always rely on in a pinch when we needed to rally at the end of a quarter. 

I could not have been happier, when after a couple years of crushing his goals. Tim was promoted to a Territory field account manager and relocated to Chicago. Just as he has excelled as a commercial account manager he continues to excel in the field role. Tim is a rare find and some one that will always do the right thing along with what is needed to get the job done.
